string-array.name: changelog_text
string-array.item:
" - The text field for the username can't be left empty now
" "- The activity won't be reloaded if the user presses "Create Room" after not having entered a roomname
" "- After creating a room the user will now be notified with a toast "Room created" that the action was successful
" "- The application now uses its own icon
" "
 "

" - Messages are now displayed in colored textboxes
" "- A profile picture is now being shown next to the message of other users. Currently it just displays the first letter of the username
" "- The time a message was sent is now being shown next to the message
" "
 "

" - A Menu is now available in the room selection. The own name is being displayed there and a variety of other functions are accessible
" "- The Changelog and a "About us" section can be accessed from there
" "- The own profile can now be viewed
" "- The application's icon has been redesigned to better fit to the colors being used in the chatrooms
" "
 "

" - Messages in a chat can now be copied by pressing
" "- When creating a room, a category and a password must now be entered
" "- The password will be saved on the device after being entered correctly for the first time. It will be entered automatically in the future, so the user can switch between rooms faster
" "- The category of a room is displayed in the room selection beneath the room name
" "
 "

" - The position of the button to add a room has been changed
" "- If a entry in the database is being altered or deleted, the chatroom will now be updated in real time
" "- The creator of a room is now longer being asked to enter the room's password
" "- New categories for rooms have been added
" "- Messages from the same sender and same time will now be combined to one textbox
" "- The user can now change the corners of the textboxes in the "Design" submenu
" "- At the start of a room, it is now displayed when and by whom the room was created
" "- Between messages of different days, the date of the new day is now being shown
" "
 "

" - Images from the gallery can now be posted
" "- Images can also be taken with the camera and posted directly from the app
" "- Images can be downloaded to the device by pressing on it
" "- The background can be changed in the "Design" submenu
" "- A dark theme is available in the "Design" submenu
" "- Messages can now be quoted
" "- Rooms that the user doesn't have access to will now be marked with a lock in the room selection
" "- Rooms that the user does have access to will now show the time of the newest message in the room selection
" "- Rooms that the user does have access to will now be sorted on the newest message in the room selection
" "- The layout of the room selection has been improved and now uses the whole screen
" "- Links are now identified as such. The website will be opened in the browser after pressing on the link
" "- A back button is now available in the chatroom that brings the user back to the room selection
" "- A info button is now available in the chatroom that displays infos about the room
" "- The text at the start of a room and the displays for the dates have received a new layout
" "- Dates and Times are now being adjusted to the settings of the device
" "- The app now has its own splash screen
" "- The username now has a limit of 15 characters
" "- The roomname now has a limit of 25 characters
" "- blanks at the start and the end of a message are now being removed
" "- The username can now be changed in the "My Profile" submenu
" "- The user is now being notified if no database connection can be established
" "- A serious bug was fixed that caused a immediate crash after restarting
" "- Android versions below 4.4 are no longer supported
" "
 "

" - User profiles now have a bio, a date of birth and a location
" "- The own profile can now be edited
" "- Every user has a own unique ID
" "- The user's favorite color is being displayed as background of the user's profile picture
" "- Profiles of other users can now be opened in the chat
" "- Images can now be quoted
" "- Messages can now be forwarded
" "- The room selection now has three tabs: "My rooms", "Favorites" and "More"
" "- Rooms can now be pinned
" "- Messages in a chat can now be searched
" "- A backup of the entire chat can now be created and saved to the documents folder
" "- Images and backups can now be opened directly after saving
" "- Images can now be opened in full screen
" "- Rooms now have a description
" "- Other users can now be mentioned with \@
" "- Entered but not sent text is now saved when leaving the room. This can be disabled in the settings
" "- Text can now be marked as bold and italic with \* and \_
" "- If the user scrolls up, a button will now be shown to jump back to the newest message directly
" "- Chats can now be read without a internet connection. Sent messages will be sent to the server when internet connection has been reestablished
" "- English is now a supported language
" "- The uppercase mode will automatically be activated at the beginning of a new sentence
" "- Text fields can now be cleared with the click of a button
" "- Messages now have a limit of 5000 characters
" "- The character limit is now being displayed beneath input fields
" "- If the user enters something in a input field the hint is now being showed above
" "- The password can now be displayed in readable characters by pressing a button
" "- Breaks are now possible when entering a message. Up to six lines are displayed in the input field
" "- The action bar will no longer disappear when the user opens the keyboard
" "- The keyboard no longer overlaps the input field
" "- The user is no being notified when he quotes a message
" "- Textboxes are no wider in landscape mode
" "- The user must no longer login after every restart of the app
" "- The app icon has been optimized for Samsung devices
" "- The user is now being notified if no room exists
" "- Messages from the same user and time are now displayed in different textboxes. The gap is smaller and name and profile picture will only be displayed for the first message
" "- The navigation bar is now grey on devices with onscreen navigation bar when switching to dark theme
" "- The options menu appearing when clicking on a message has been given a new design
" "- A bug was fixed that allowed the user to send empty messages
" "- A bug was fixed that caused the keyboard to not close properly when the user clicks on "Cancel"
" "- A bug was fixed that was triggered when the user tried to create a room with the name of an already existing room
" "
 "

"- Push notifications can now be received
" "- User profiles now have a banner
" "- Banners and profile images can now be edited
" "- Messages can now be pinned
" "- A gallery with all pictures of a room can now be opened
" "- Images can now be forwarded
" "- GIFs are now supported
" "- A preview of the newest message in a room is now displayed in the room list
" "- Rooms containing unread messages are now highlighted in the room list
" "- Unread messages are now marked with "Unread messages" in the chat room
" "- Rooms can now be searched
" "- Photos taken with the camera are now automatically saved to the "MyChatApp" Images Directory
" "- A member list is now available in the room info
" "- The admin can now edit the room
" "- Rooms can now be left
" "- The special characters \., \$, \[, \], \# and / can now be used in room names
" "- The input field is no longer overlapping the messages when it contains more than two lines
" "- Messages with more than 2000 characters are no longer shown completely. Clicking on "Show more" shows the entire message
" "- The character limit per message has been raised to 10000
" "- Backup files now contain the date of their creation and messages are packed together by date
" "- Snackbars are now shown a bit longer and can be dismissed by swiping
" "- A "Detective Pikachu" background image is now available
" "- Background images are now displayed properly in landscape mode
" "- Error messages for input fields have been redesigned
" "- The changelog and design menu have received new layouts
" "- The option to modify corners of textboxes has been removed
" "- Quoted messages are now displayed above the input field
" "- Quoting can now be cancelled by pressing the clear button on the right side
" "- Quotes are now shortened after three lines
" "- Jumping to the quoted message is now possible with a simple click on the quote
" "- Message boxes are now being highlighted when clicking on them
" "- Dialogs now adjust their size when the keyboard is opened to prevent it from overlapping the dialog
" "- After opening an image the background is now black in Dark Theme
" "- The System UI is now completely hidden when pictures are opened in fullscreen
" "- When using the search function, the User will now get to the message outside the search by clicking on it
" "- The search function is now slightly faster
" "- If no message is found via the search function, the "No message found" text is now placed more visible when the keyboard is opened
" "- The search process is now being stopped when sending a message or an image or creating a room
" "- Hearts are now displayed next to the rooms in the favorites tab
" "- The status bar is now transparent when the NavigationView is being opened
" "- The own profile can now also be opened by clicking on the profile image in the NavigationView
" "- A bug leading to crashes when using overlapping formatting with \* and \_ was fixed
" "- Device information and crash reports are now submitted to the developer
" "- Android versions below 5.0 are no longer supported
" "
 "

"- The account system has been optimized. Using the app is now only possible when authenticated
" "- Push notifications now have a "Reply" and "Mark as read" function
" "- The admin can now set a room image
" "- The user can now slide through the image list when an image is opened in fullscreen
" "- All AlertDialogs have a new header now
" "- Automatic saving of pictures taken with the camera function to the device can now be disabled in the settings
" "- Previewing images in the chat room, can now be disabled if they are not cached
" "- Muted rooms are now marked with an icon in the roomlist
" "- When quoting an image, the image to be quoted is now previewed
" "- When uploading a profile image or banner, a progress dialog is now shown
" "- A bug not showing the profile banner button in the "Edit profile" menu when the user has no own banner was fixed
" "
 "

"- Many dependencies have been updated
" "- Android versions below Android 8.0 Oreo are no longer supported
" "- Many code improvements
" "
 "

"- Login screen now uses correct theme for buttons
" "- Many code improvements
" "
 "

"- A crash that occurred when the creator of a message had no valid user ID has been fixed
" "- A bug that text sizes were not properly adapted to the system settings has been fixed
" "- A bug that the search text for forwarded messages was not highlighted has been fixed
" "- A bug that profile images and banners could not be opened in fullscreen inside a chat room has been fixed
" "- A crash that occurred when searching for messages that have been sent at the same time has been fixed
" "- A bug that the icon for muted rooms was not updated has been fixed
" "- A bug that rooms were added multiple times to the room list "More" has been fixed
" "- A bug that rooms newly added to the room list "Favorites" had no room image and message preview has been fixed
" "- A bug that allowed users to send de facto empty messages with the help of formatting characters has been fixed
" "- A crash that occurred under certain conditions when searching a room has been fixed
" "- A bug that the chosen theme was not properly applied to the dialog windows on the login screen has been fixed
" "- Many code improvements
" "
 "

"- Users can now delete their own account
" "- Admins can now delete a room
" "- The room image is now displayed on the forward message screen
" "- The action bar is now green in light mode
" "- The search string in room search is now highlighted red just like when searching a message
" "- The profile screen has been redesigned
" "- The room info screen now contains the room image and the room name
" "- The list of available room categories has been updated
" "- Quotes now use a new layout that includes the profile image of the sender of the quoted message
" "- Mandatory fields are now marked with an asterisk
" "- Room and profile descriptions are no longer mandatory fields
" "- The resend e-mail screen now contains an additional note
" "- Fullscreen images can now be closed by swiping
" "- A crash that occurred when the user of the newest message of a room no longer exists has been fixed
" "- A bug that images were not properly displayed on the pinboard has been fixed
" "- A bug that the "Reply" and "Mark as read" receivers for push notifications were not working has been fixed
" "- A bug that unknown users appeared multiple times on the member list has been fixed
" "- Many code improvements
" "
 "

"- The character limit for passwords has been increased to 32
" "- When writing in the E-Mail fields the E-Mail keyboard is now used
" "- When creating a new account an additional check if the E-Mail address has a valid format has been implemented
" "- The minimum age for users now dynamically increases (Users must be at least 14 years old)
" "- The message "No database connection" is no longer displayed when logging out
" "- A crash that occurred when pinning a message has been fixed
" "- A bug that the birthday in the date picker dialog is reset to the default value has been fixed
" "- A bug that the camera, backup and save image functions were not usable on Android 13 has been fixed
" "
 "
